name: Project Aethia - Demo Prototype
description:
Project Introduction:
Project Aethia is intended to be a fantasy exploration story in first person based on parkour and with some puzzles to resolve. 

This is a demonstration project and nothing else more.



The Story:
The story behind is that you are a young woman (Sara) and you lost your mother some years ago inside the woods, since you and her liked to go in nature and do hiking.

After some time, you reached out again the place last time you seen her, and this time you've found a crack in the rock that you have never seen before.
Entering that rift will give you the possibility to research the vicissitudes that brought your mother in those caves and discover the hidden secrets that lie in those tunnels...







Game Credits:
This project has been developed by some students of the private videogames academy in Rome, AIV (https://www.aiv01.it).
